thread.title: Will Grier suspension: Florida’s season still on track minus starting QB - College Football
thread.title_full: Will Grier suspension: Florida’s season still on track minus starting QB - College Football - SI.com

author: OddsShark
title: Will Grier suspension: Florida’s season still on track minus starting QB - College Football
text:
by Andy Staples Twitter Email Posted: Mon Oct. 12, 2015 GAINESVILLE, Fla. — Before we get to the news of the day and its repercussions, let’s ponder a hypothetical.
What if someone had gone to Jim McElwain after the first few days of Florida ’s spring practice—when the first-year coach began to fully understand how little experience and production he’d inherited on offense—and asked him the following question: “What would you say if I told you this team would win at least eight or nine games, but you’ll have to deal with some serious drama at the halfway point of the season?”
The most likely answer from McElwain at that point would have been, “Bring on the drama!”
College Football Video Florida quarterback Will Grier suspended after positive PED test by Andy Staples
